sheets.sql: select name as sheetname, code as columnparam from wares where incl > 0

columns.sql: select s1.d, volume, density, mass from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d, azscode from sessions s) s1 left join (select session_id, sum(volume) as volume, max(density) as density, round(sum(volume*density/1000),3) as mass from sessions s join inoutgsm i on s.id = i.session_id where s.azscode=:azscode and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 and ware_code = :columnparam group by session_id) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.azscode=:azscode and s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)

columngroup.title: Счётчики
columngroup.sql: select hosenum as groupname, hosenum as groupparam from choses where azscode=:azscode

columns.sql: select sc, ec from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d, azscode from sessions s ) s1 left join (select session_id, min(startcounter) as sc, max(endcounter) as ec from sessions s join iotankshoses i on s.id=i.session_id where s.azscode=:azscode and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 and hosenum=cast(:groupparam as integer) and warecode = :columnparam group by session_id ) as s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.azscode=:azscode and s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)

select round(s2.amount,2) as amount, round(s2.amount0,2) as summ, s2.nds as nds from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d, azscode from sessions s ) s1 left join (select session_id, sum(amount) as amount, max(nds) as nds, sum(amount - amount * cast(nds as double precision) / (100+cast(nds as double precision))) as amount0 from sessions s join inoutgsm i on s.id=i.session_id where s.azscode=:azscode and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 and ware_code=:columnparam group by session_id) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.azscode=:azscode and s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)
